name: WyndHalo&HomePurifier
0:
”Alexa, open halo home”
”Alexa, ask halo home for wynd score”
”Alexa, ask halo home to turn night mode on”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: halo home
Developer Terms of Use
des: Ask Alexa to change Wynd Home Purifier's fan speed, turn on/off the night mode of your Wynd Halo and Home Purifier's night mode based on room and fetch the current Wynd score of your room from Wynd Halo
